Race.SpecificTitle: Enterprise Rec. Dist. -- 15 Mills - BOC - 10 yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall Enterprise Recreation District of the Parish of Catahoula, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of fifteen (15) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $32,100 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2015 and ending with the year 2024, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating recreational facilities for the District, including necessary equipment therefor?
